# Trading Bot - Security First

# === NEVER COMMIT THESE ===
# Real API keys, passwords, or credentials
*api_key*
*password*
*secret*
*credential*
*token*

# Local configuration files with sensitive data
*local*.config
*private*.config
*live*.config

# Trading account information
account_*.txt
broker_*.json

# === Development ===
# Visual Studio / VS Code
.vs/
.vscode/
*.user
*.suo
bin/
obj/

# NinjaTrader generated files
*.ninjatrader
*.ntws

# Node.js (if added later)
node_modules/
npm-debug.log*

# === Logs ===
*.log
logs/
*.tmp

# === OS Generated ===
.DS_Store
.DS_Store?
._*
.Spotlight-V100
.Trashes
ehthumbs.db
Thumbs.db

# === Backup Files ===
*.bak
*.backup
*.old

# === Temporary Files ===
*.temp
*.swp
*~

# === IDE ===
*.ide
*.ide-wal
*.ide-shm

# === Deployment ===
.vercel
.env
.env.local
.env.production
